name: The Starship Lemon Drop and the Disturbing Case of The Chess Eaters
name_original: The Starship Lemon Drop and the Disturbing Case of The Chess Eaters
description:
Save as many pieces as you can. There are 10 levels. Don't forget to use your mines.

The screen floats to allow for larger play area so you may hear the chess eaters appearing off the screen. you'll also hear the cries of the pieces getting attacked off screen. don't give up if you lose one, there are plenty of them to save. After all they're only pawns.
